description: Describes the current AWS End User Messaging SMS and Voice SMS Voice V2 resource quotas for your account. The description for a quota includes the quota name, current usage toward that quota, and the quota's maximum value. When you establish an Amazon Web Services account, the account has initial quotas on the maximum number of configuration sets, opt-out lists, phone numbers, and pools that you can create in a given Region. For more information see Quotas in the AWS End User Messaging SMS User Guide.

nested_items.name: AccountLimits
nested_items.description: An array of AccountLimit objects that show the current spend limits.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the attribute to apply the account limit to.

nested_items.name: Used
nested_items.description: The current amount that has been spent, in US dollars.

nested_items.name: Max
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services set limit for that resource type, in US dollars.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The token to be used for the next set of paginated results. If this field is empty then there are no more results.
